column4: Hello all I am a newbie that needs someone to take pity on me and help me mount a floppy drive.  I keep screwing something up.
goomie If it automounted then I should be able to just put a blasted floppy in the drive should I not?
I have read somewhere that there must be a mount point, but am unsure how to check if that is present.
any directory can be mounted to
